column1: Women Stereotypes
Housewife cooking while husband relaxes on the sofa.
Woman driving while men look shocked.
Bride crying at her wedding
Woman in office ignored by male colleagues.
Girl playing soccer while parents scold her.
Woman in gym lifting weights while men laugh.
Mother balancing work and baby
Teen girl studying while parents tell her to learn cooking.
Female scientist presenting while men dismiss her ideas.
Woman in short dress being judged by elderly women.
Woman leading a meeting
Female taxi driver while male passengers look doubtful.
Woman eating alone at a restaurant while others stare.
Young girl reaching for a toy car while clerk hands her a doll.
Woman repairing a car while men look confused.
Bride being told that her husband’s house is her ‘real home.’
Teen girl told to choose teaching over engineering.
Woman drinking in a bar while people whisper.
Female police officer stopping a man
Woman proposing to a man
Woman playing video games while men call her ‘fake gamer.’
Girl being told to wear makeup to look ‘presentable.’
Female politician giving a speech while men look bored.
Woman breastfeeding in public while people stare in shock.
Girl being told her real dream is marriage
Men Stereotypes
Man struggling to change a diaper while wife laughs.
Stay-at-home dad cleaning while friends tease him.
Man crying while others tell him to ‘be strong.’
Short man in a business meeting being ignored.
Boy playing with dolls while father looks angry.
Man wearing pink while other men laugh at him.
Male nurse being told nursing is for women.
Man cooking while his in-laws look shocked.
Husband earning less than wife while in-laws whisper.
Man asking for paternity leave while boss laughs.
Boy choosing fashion as a career while parents protest.
Man in a yoga class while others mock him.
Husband doing laundry while wife’s family judges him.
Teen boy told to choose engineering over art.
Father at a playground with child while others call it ‘babysitting.’
Husband serving tea to guests while they laugh at him.
Male ballet dancer being mocked by other men.
Man refusing to drink alcohol while friends call him weak.
Boy being scolded for learning to cook.
Man wearing floral clothes while coworkers joke.
Husband letting wife drive while family looks shocked.
Man doing skincare while friends call him ‘girly.’
Husband cleaning house while wife scrolls on phone.
Man choosing teaching over business while family protests.
Boy reading romance novels while friends tease him.
